article_title: UnitedHealth's Optum To Escalate Growth As Provider Of Medical Care

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: UnitedHealth Group executives are looking at more acquisitions and growth as a provider of medical care as its Optum unit looks to consolidate the fragmented ambulatory care market. UnitedHealth, the nation’s largest health insurance company, hinted that the acquisition of MedExpress, which operates urgent care centers in 14 states, wouldn’t be [...]
